languages.text: "Надеюсь, вы понимаете, что мы говорим не о судьбе какой-то колонии. Мне нет дела до одной планеты, сколь угодно прибыльной и многолюдной. Но если скверна вновь поднимет голову на Кьяве Гамма и попытается распространиться — я выжгу ее. А вы... На вас ляжет вина в преступном небрежении".

"I hope you realise that we're talking about more than the fate of some colony. I care not for a single planet, however profitable and populous. But should corruption raise its head again on Kiava Gamma and try to spread — I will burn it away. And you... you will be guilty of criminal negligence."
languages.original_text: "Надеюсь, вы понимаете, что мы говорим не о судьбе какой-то колонии. Мне нет дела до одной планеты, сколь угодно прибыльной и многолюдной. Но если скверна вновь поднимет голову на Кьяве Гамма и попытается распространиться — я выжгу ее. А вы... На вас ляжет вина в преступном небрежении".

traits.locale_text: "I hope you realise that we're talking about more than the fate of some colony. I care not for a single planet, however profitable and populous. But should corruption raise its head again on Kiava Gamma and try to spread — I will burn it away. And you... You will be guilty of criminal negligence."

"I hope you realise that we're talking about more than the fate of some colony. I care not for a single planet, however profitable and populous. But should corruption raise its head again on Kiava Gamma and try to spread — I will burn it away. And you... You will be guilty of criminal negligence."

"I hope you realise that we're talking about more than the fate of some colony. I care not for a single planet, however profitable and populous. But should corruption raise its head again on Kiava Gamma and try to spread — I will burn it away. And you... you will be guilty of criminal negligence."

"I hope you realise that we're talking about more than the fate of some colony. I care not for a single planet, however profitable and populous. But should corruption raise its head again on Kiava Gamma and try to spread — I will burn it away. And you... you will be guilty of criminal negligence."

"I hope you realise that we're talking about more than the fate of some colony. I care not for a single planet, however profitable and populous. But should corruption raise its head again on Kiava Gamma and try to spread — I will burn it away. And you... you will be guilty of criminal negligence."

languages.text: 「コロニーの命運より重大な話をしていると気づいてもらいたいものだ。惑星ひとつを心配しているのではない、その星がどんなに経済的でどんなに多くの住民がいようとも関係ない。万一、キアヴァ・ガンマに腐朽が広がろうものなら――跡形もなく焼き尽くしてやろう。そしてお前も…怠慢を犯した罪人となるのだ」
languages.original_text: "I hope you realise that we're talking about more than the fate of some colony. I care not for a single planet, however profitable and populous. But should corruption raise its head again on Kiava Gamma and try to spread — I will burn it away. And you... you will be guilty of criminal negligence."

traits.locale_text: 「コロニーの命運より重大な話をしていると気づいてもらいたいものだ。惑星ひとつを心配しているのではない、その星がどんなに経済的でどんなに多くの住民がいようとも関係ない。万一、キアヴァ・ガンマに腐朽が広がろうものなら――跡形もなく焼き尽くしてやろう。そしてお前も…怠慢を犯した罪人となるのだ」

languages.original_text: "I hope you realise that we're talking about more than the fate of some colony. I care not for a single planet, however profitable and populous. But should corruption raise its head again on Kiava Gamma and try to spread — I will burn it away. And you... you will be guilty of criminal negligence."

languages.text: “我希望你能明白，我们讨论的绝不是某个殖民地的命运。我不关心任何某颗行星的情况，不关心它是否富庶，是否人口众多。然而，如果基亚瓦伽马星再次出现腐化并有蔓延之势，我会用烈焰净化它。而你……你将以玩忽职守入罪。”
languages.original_text: "I hope you realise that we're talking about more than the fate of some colony. I care not for a single planet, however profitable and populous. But should corruption raise its head again on Kiava Gamma and try to spread — I will burn it away. And you... you will be guilty of criminal negligence."

traits.locale_text: “我希望你能明白，我们讨论的绝不是某个殖民地的命运。我不关心任何某颗行星的情况，不关心它是否富庶，是否人口众多。然而，如果基亚瓦伽马星再次出现腐化并有蔓延之势，我会用烈焰净化它。而你……你将以玩忽职守入罪。”

languages.text: «Espero que se dé cuenta de que hablamos de más que el destino de una colonia. No me importa un solo planeta, por poblado y lucrativo que sea. Sin embargo, si la corrupción vuelve a aparecer en Kiava Gamma e intenta propagarse... la quemaré. Y usted... será culpable de negligencia criminal».
languages.original_text: "I hope you realise that we're talking about more than the fate of some colony. I care not for a single planet, however profitable and populous. But should corruption raise its head again on Kiava Gamma and try to spread — I will burn it away. And you... you will be guilty of criminal negligence."

traits.locale_text: «Espero que se dé cuenta de que hablamos de más que el destino de una colonia. No me importa un solo planeta, por poblado y lucrativo que sea. Sin embargo, si la corrupción vuelve a aparecer en Kiava Gamma e intenta propagarse... la quemaré. Y usted... será culpable de negligencia criminal».

languages.text: « J'espère que vous avez conscience qu'il ne s'agit pas seulement du destin d'une colonie. Le sort d'une seule planète m'importe peu, aussi lucrative et densément peuplée soit-elle. Mais si la corruption se manifeste à nouveau sur Kiava Gamma et essaie de s'étendre... alors je la réduirai en cendres. Et vous... vous vous serez {mf|rendu|rendue} coupable de négligence criminelle. »
languages.original_text: "I hope you realise that we're talking about more than the fate of some colony. I care not for a single planet, however profitable and populous. But should corruption raise its head again on Kiava Gamma and try to spread — I will burn it away. And you... you will be guilty of criminal negligence."

traits.locale_text: « J'espère que vous avez conscience qu'il ne s'agit pas seulement du destin d'une colonie. Le sort d'une seule planète m'importe peu, aussi lucrative et densément peuplée soit-elle. Mais si la corruption se manifeste à nouveau sur Kiava Gamma et essaie de s'étendre... alors je la réduirai en cendres. Et vous... vous vous serez {mf|rendu|rendue} coupable de négligence criminelle. »

languages.text: "Hoffentlich ist Euch klar, dass es hier um mehr geht als das Schicksal irgendeiner Kolonie. Ein einzelner Planet ist unwichtig, wie profitabel und bewohnt er auch sein mag. Aber sollte die Verderbnis ihr Haupt auf Kiava Gamma erneut erheben und versuchen, sich auszubreiten – dann werde ich sie ausbrennen. Und Ihr ... seid dann der strafbaren Fahrlässigkeit schuldig."
languages.original_text: "I hope you realise that we're talking about more than the fate of some colony. I care not for a single planet, however profitable and populous. But should corruption raise its head again on Kiava Gamma and try to spread — I will burn it away. And you... you will be guilty of criminal negligence."

traits.locale_text: "Hoffentlich ist Euch klar, dass es hier um mehr geht als das Schicksal irgendeiner Kolonie. Ein einzelner Planet ist unwichtig, wie profitabel und bewohnt er auch sein mag. Aber sollte die Verderbnis ihr Haupt auf Kiava Gamma erneut erheben und versuchen, sich auszubreiten – dann werde ich sie ausbrennen. Und Ihr ... seid dann der strafbaren Fahrlässigkeit schuldig."

languages.text: "Umarım yalnızca koloninin birine ne olacağı hakkında konuşmuyor olduğumuzu fark etmişsindir. İstediği kadar kazanç getirsin veya kalabalık olsun, tek bir gezegen umurumda olmaz. Ancak Kiava Gama'da bir kez daha yozlaşma baş gösterip yayılmaya başlarsa orayı kül ederim. Sen de ihmalkârlıktan suçlu bulunursun."
languages.original_text: "I hope you realise that we're talking about more than the fate of some colony. I care not for a single planet, however profitable and populous. But should corruption raise its head again on Kiava Gamma and try to spread — I will burn it away. And you... you will be guilty of criminal negligence."

traits.locale_text: "Umarım yalnızca koloninin birine ne olacağı hakkında konuşmuyor olduğumuzu fark etmişsindir. İstediği kadar kazanç getirsin veya kalabalık olsun, tek bir gezegen umurumda olmaz ama Kiava Gama'da yozlaşma bir kez daha baş gösterip yayılmaya başlarsa, onu kül ederim. Sen de ihmalkârlıktan suçlu bulunursun."
